song.englishname: My Redeemer Is Faithful And True

english.segment1: As I look back on the road Ive traveled. I see so many times He carried me through. And if theres one thing that Ive learned in my life. My Redeemer is faithful and true. My Redeemer is faithful and true
english.segment2: My Redeemer is faithful and true. Everything He has said He will do. And every morning His mercies are new. My Redeemer is faithful and true
english.segment3: My heart rejoices when I read the promise. There is a place I am preparing for you. I know someday Ill see my Lord face to face. Cause my Redeemer is faithful and true
english.segment4: My Redeemer is faithful and true. Everything He has said He will do. And every morning His mercies are new. My Redeemer is faithful and true
english.segment5: And in every situation He has proved His love to me. When I lack the understanding, He gives more grace to me
english.segment6: My Redeemer is faithful and true. Everything He has said He will do. And every morning His mercies are new. My Redeemer is faithful and true.
